citations.narrative:
Building 23 housing juvenile Baboons and Building 111 housing rhesus macaques have numerous walls in the animal
enclosures where paint is peeling off the cinder block walls. In some areas the cement surface of the cinder block is
exposed. Surfaces in this condition are difficult to sanitize properly . All surfaces must be maintained on a regular basis.
CORRECT BY : 9/20/21
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the attending veterinarian and facility employees.
End Section

narrative:
3.75(c)(2) 
   
Housing facilities, general. 
Building 23 housing juvenile Baboons and Building 111 housing rhesus macaques have numerous walls in the animal 
enclosures where  paint is peeling off the cinder block walls. In some areas the cement surface of the cinder block is 
exposed. Surfaces in this condition are difficult to sanitize properly . All surfaces must be maintained on a regular basis. 
CORRECT BY : 9/20/21 
 
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the attending veterinarian and facility employees. 
 
End Section
